name: Samaritan House VITA
description: Free tax preparation with drop-off service
fullDescription: Samaritan House provides free tax preparation services for San Mateo County residents, including a convenient drop-off service option.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free tax preparation
- Drop-off service available (no need to wait)
- Federal and state returns
- Help with tax credits
- IRS-certified volunteers
howToGetIt:
1. Call for tax questions or to schedule
2. Gather all required documents
3. Drop off documents or attend in-person appointment
4. Receive call when return is ready for review
5. Sign and file your return
keywords: Samaritan House, VITA, San Mateo, free tax preparation, drop-off service, tax credits, IRS certified, San Mateo County
